nodes.text: In the year 3.5 ABY, a small group of bounty hunters under the leadership of the Barabel Skahtul captured the Jedi Luke Skywalker on the planet Kothlis with the intention of cashing in on the bounty placed on him by the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Vader. With Skywalker imprisoned in a small cell, a male Barabel guard watched over him, only for Skywalker to use a Jedi mind trick to mentally compel the guard to unlock the cell door and take a nap on the bunk inside, thus allowing Skywalker to escape.
